Content API: Legal Problem¶

Returns a specific legal problem package. This includes the full content: problem, solutions, etc.

Function call¶

Method: GET

Sample Output¶

See the order of protection JSON file.

Parameters¶

  • identifier: the uuid of the problem (required)
